abstract: Popular streaming websites in China, inspired by enormous popularity of South Korean television drama My Love From Another Star, are seeking to develop their own Korean-style online content in effort to tap into China's fascination with Korean popular culture.
lead_paragraph: An interplanetary romance is fodder for the South Korean television drama “My Love From Another Star,” which is a hit in China, the world’s largest streaming market.

headline.main: China’s Love Affair With Irresistible Korean TV
headline.print_headline: Chinese Fall for Lover From Afar

snippet: An interplanetary romance is fodder for the South Korean television drama “My Love From Another Star,” which is a hit in China, the world’s largest streaming market.
